entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 20 early this evening then becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening then changing to periods of rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
